name: Inappropriate chat behavior
description: Includes insults, sexism, racism and other types of hate speech

name: Extremism
description: Includes right-wing & left-wing extremism and support for dangerous organizations

name: Provocation
description: Includes provoking players as a form of trolling

name: Spamming
description: When a player spams quite a few messages in quick succession

name: Advertisement
description: When a player posts links or advertises for a public figure

name: Chat exclusion
description: Permanently excludes a player from the chat
